content.prompt: The utilitarian found-object nature of Marcel Duchampâ€™s Fountain (second version) elicited an initial response of rejection and confusion because it

choices.label: satirized a similar work by a contemporary artist
challenged the philosophical idea of what art is
offended the viewer by mocking a well-known art critic
courted controversy with its reference to fascist ideologies

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
